description: Rules for the maven manager. See https://docs.renovatebot.com/configuration-options for available options

packageRules.description: Show only the artifactId in the title of single-dependency pull requests: 'update junit-jupiter-api to v6' instead of 'update dependency org.junit.jupiter:junit-jupiter-api to v6'
Only suggest dependency versions that are older than 7 days for security reasons
Enable auto-merge for all non-major dependency updates
Add all non-major dependency updates that don't match a more specific rule below to 'minor runtime dependencies' group
Add all non-major test dependency updates to 'minor develop dependencies' group
Add all non-major build dependency updates to 'minor develop dependencies' group
Suppress the minimum release age for internal libraries
